meanings.definition: A person who bumbles or moves clumsily.
meanings.sent1: The bumbler tripped over his own feet.
meanings.sent2: The group of bumblers struggled to navigate the crowded room.
meanings.sent3: The bumbler accidentally knocked over a stack of books.
meanings.sent4: Among the crowd of dancers, he stood out like a bumbler in a field of graceful swans.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bumbler stumbling in the dark stayed with her.

meanings.definition: A group of people who bumble or act in a clumsy manner.
meanings.sent1: The bumblers in the team kept bumping into each other.
meanings.sent2: At the carnival, the group of bumblers struggled to win any prizes.
meanings.sent3: The bumblers managed to spill their drinks all over the table.
meanings.sent4: In the chaotic kitchen, they resembled a group of bumblers trying to cook a feast.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the bumblers trying to assemble the tent was comical.
